CustomField.formula: IF(Has_Primary_Quote__c, IF(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.ACV__c <= 0, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Manual_ACV__c)) && Manual_ACV__c > 0, Manual_ACV__c, Total_ACV_Admin__c), SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.ACV__c), If(and(OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "closed won"),ISPICKVAL(StageName, "closed lost")),CloseDate < DATE(2023,04,15)) ,Total_ACV_Admin__c, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Manual_ACV__c)) && Manual_ACV__c > 1, Manual_ACV__c, Total_ACV_Admin__c)))
CustomField.label: ACV
